column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Everybody knows that CBBR is a happening spot. I'm not sure if it's because it fosters the kind of camaraderie that is only forged when you share too-small amounts of delicious food
column4: you only have to show up most any night to see that there are a whole slew of people who had the same idea you did: eat good food with good friends
